Take heed<S>4337</S> that ye do<S>4160</S> not<S>3361</S> your<S>5216</S> alms<S>1654</S> before<S>1715</S> men<S>444</S>, to be seen<S>4314</S> <S>2300</S> of them<S>846</S>: otherwise<S>1490</S> ye have<S>2192</S> no<S>3756</S> reward<S>3408</S> of<S>3844</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>. <sup>alms: or, righteousness</sup> <sup>of your: or, with your</sup>
Therefore<S>3767</S> when<S>3752</S> thou doest<S>4160</S> thine alms<S>1654</S>, do<S>4537</S> not<S>3361</S> sound a trumpet<S>4537</S> before<S>1715</S> thee<S>4675</S>, as<S>5618</S> the hypocrites<S>5273</S> do<S>4160</S> in<S>1722</S> the synagogues<S>4864</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the streets<S>4505</S>, that<S>3704</S> they may have glory<S>1392</S> of<S>5259</S> men<S>444</S>. Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, They have<S>568</S> their<S>846</S> reward<S>3408</S>. <sup>do not: or, cause not a trumpet to be sounded</sup>
But<S>1161</S> when thou<S>4675</S> doest<S>4160</S> alms<S>1654</S>, let<S>1097</S> not<S>3361</S> thy<S>4675</S> left hand<S>710</S> know<S>1097</S> what<S>5101</S> thy<S>4675</S> right hand<S>1188</S> doeth<S>4160</S>:
That<S>3704</S> thine<S>4675</S> alms<S>1654</S> may be<S>5600</S> in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S>: and<S>2532</S> thy<S>4675</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> seeth<S>991</S> in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S> himself<S>846</S> shall reward<S>591</S> thee<S>4671</S> openly<S>1722</S> <S>5318</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> thou prayest<S>4336</S>, thou shalt<S>2071</S> not<S>3756</S> be<S>2071</S> as<S>5618</S> the hypocrites<S>5273</S> are: for<S>3754</S> they love<S>5368</S> to pray<S>4336</S> standing<S>2476</S> in<S>1722</S> the synagogues<S>4864</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> the corners<S>1137</S> of the streets<S>4113</S>, that<S>3704</S> they may<S>302</S> be seen<S>5316</S> of men<S>444</S>. Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> They have<S>568</S> their<S>846</S> reward<S>3408</S>.
But<S>1161</S> thou<S>4771</S>, when<S>3752</S> thou prayest<S>4336</S>, enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> thy<S>4675</S> closet<S>5009</S>, and<S>2532</S> when thou hast shut<S>2808</S> thy<S>4675</S> door<S>2374</S>, pray<S>4336</S> to thy<S>4675</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S>; and<S>2532</S> thy<S>4675</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> seeth<S>991</S> in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S> shall reward<S>591</S> thee<S>4671</S> openly<S>1722</S> <S>5318</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when ye pray<S>4336</S>, use<S>945</S> not<S>3361</S> vain repetitions<S>945</S>, as<S>5618</S> the heathen<S>1482</S> do: for<S>1063</S> they think<S>1380</S> that<S>3754</S> they shall be heard<S>1522</S> for<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> much speaking<S>4180</S>.
Be<S>3666</S> not<S>3361</S> ye<S>3666</S> therefore<S>3767</S> like<S>3666</S> unto them<S>846</S>: for<S>1063</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> what things<S>3739</S> ye have<S>2192</S> need of<S>5532</S>, before<S>4253</S> ye<S>5209</S> ask<S>154</S> him<S>846</S>.
After this manner<S>3779</S> therefore<S>3767</S> pray<S>4336</S> ye<S>5210</S>: Our<S>2257</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> art in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, Hallowed be<S>37</S> thy<S>4675</S> name<S>3686</S>.
Thy<S>4675</S> kingdom<S>932</S> come<S>2064</S>. Thy<S>4675</S> will<S>2307</S> be done<S>1096</S> in<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S>, as<S>2532</S> <S>5613</S> it is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
Give<S>1325</S> us<S>2254</S> this day<S>4594</S> our<S>2257</S> daily<S>1967</S> bread<S>740</S>.
And<S>2532</S> forgive<S>863</S> us<S>2254</S> our<S>2257</S> debts<S>3783</S>, as<S>2532</S> <S>5613</S> we<S>2249</S> forgive<S>863</S> our<S>2257</S> debtors<S>3781</S>.
And<S>2532</S> lead<S>1533</S> us<S>2248</S> not<S>3361</S> into<S>1519</S> temptation<S>3986</S>, but<S>235</S> deliver<S>4506</S> us<S>2248</S> from<S>575</S> evil<S>4190</S>: For<S>3754</S> thine<S>4675</S> is<S>2076</S> the kingdom<S>932</S>, and<S>2532</S> the power<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> the glory<S>1391</S>, for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1437</S> ye forgive<S>863</S> men<S>444</S> their<S>846</S> trespasses<S>3900</S>, your<S>5216</S> heavenly<S>3770</S> Father<S>3962</S> will also<S>2532</S> forgive<S>863</S> you<S>5213</S>:
But<S>1161</S> if<S>3362</S> ye forgive<S>863</S> not<S>3362</S> men<S>444</S> their<S>846</S> trespasses<S>3900</S>, neither<S>3761</S> will your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> forgive<S>863</S> your<S>5216</S> trespasses<S>3900</S>.
Moreover<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> ye fast<S>3522</S>, be<S>1096</S> not<S>3361</S>, as<S>5618</S> the hypocrites<S>5273</S>, of a sad countenance<S>4659</S>: for<S>1063</S> they disfigure<S>853</S> their<S>846</S> faces<S>4383</S>, that<S>3704</S> they may appear<S>5316</S> unto men<S>444</S> to fast<S>3522</S>. Verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> They have<S>568</S> their<S>846</S> reward<S>3408</S>.
But<S>1161</S> thou<S>4771</S>, when thou fastest<S>3522</S>, anoint<S>218</S> thine<S>4675</S> head<S>2776</S>, and<S>2532</S> wash<S>3538</S> thy<S>4675</S> face<S>4383</S>;
That<S>3704</S> thou appear<S>5316</S> not<S>3361</S> unto men<S>444</S> to fast<S>3522</S>, but<S>235</S> unto thy<S>4675</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S>: and<S>2532</S> thy<S>4675</S> Father<S>3962</S>, which<S>3588</S> seeth<S>991</S> in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S>, shall reward<S>591</S> thee<S>4671</S> openly<S>1722</S> <S>5318</S>.
Lay<S>2343</S> not<S>3361</S> up<S>2343</S> for yourselves<S>5213</S> treasures<S>2344</S> upon<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S>, where<S>3699</S> moth<S>4597</S> and<S>2532</S> rust<S>1035</S> doth corrupt<S>853</S>, and<S>2532</S> where<S>3699</S> thieves<S>2812</S> break through<S>1358</S> and<S>2532</S> steal<S>2813</S>:
But<S>1161</S> lay up<S>2343</S> for yourselves<S>5213</S> treasures<S>2344</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, where<S>3699</S> neither<S>3777</S> moth<S>4597</S> nor<S>3777</S> rust<S>1035</S> doth corrupt<S>853</S>, and<S>2532</S> where<S>3699</S> thieves<S>2812</S> do<S>1358</S> not<S>3756</S> break through<S>1358</S> nor<S>3761</S> steal<S>2813</S>:
For<S>1063</S> where<S>3699</S> your<S>5216</S> treasure<S>2344</S> is<S>2076</S>, there<S>1563</S> will<S>2071</S> your<S>5216</S> heart<S>2588</S> be<S>2071</S> also<S>2532</S>.
The light<S>3088</S> of the body<S>4983</S> is<S>2076</S> the eye<S>3788</S>: if<S>1437</S> therefore<S>3767</S> thine<S>4675</S> eye<S>3788</S> be<S>5600</S> single<S>573</S>, thy<S>4675</S> whole<S>3650</S> body<S>4983</S> shall be<S>2071</S> full of light<S>5460</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1437</S> thine<S>4675</S> eye<S>3788</S> be<S>5600</S> evil<S>4190</S>, thy<S>4675</S> whole<S>3650</S> body<S>4983</S> shall be<S>2071</S> full of darkness<S>4652</S>. If<S>1487</S> therefore<S>3767</S> the light<S>5457</S> that is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> thee<S>4671</S> be darkness<S>4655</S>, how great<S>4214</S> is that darkness<S>4655</S>!
No man<S>3762</S> can<S>1410</S> serve<S>1398</S> two<S>1417</S> masters<S>2962</S>: for<S>1063</S> either<S>2228</S> he will hate<S>3404</S> the one<S>1520</S>, and<S>2532</S> love<S>25</S> the other<S>2087</S>; or else<S>2228</S> he will hold<S>472</S> to the one<S>1520</S>, and<S>2532</S> despise<S>2706</S> the other<S>2087</S>. Ye cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> serve<S>1398</S> God<S>2316</S> and<S>2532</S> mammon<S>3126</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Take no<S>3361</S> thought<S>3309</S> for your<S>5216</S> life<S>5590</S>, what<S>5101</S> ye shall eat<S>5315</S>, or<S>2532</S> what<S>5101</S> ye shall drink<S>4095</S>; nor yet for<S>3366</S> your<S>5216</S> body<S>4983</S>, what<S>5101</S> ye shall put on<S>1746</S>. Is<S>2076</S> not<S>3780</S> the life<S>5590</S> more than<S>4119</S> meat<S>5160</S>, and<S>2532</S> the body<S>4983</S> than raiment<S>1742</S>?
Behold<S>1689</S> <S>1519</S> the fowls<S>4071</S> of the air<S>3772</S>: for<S>3754</S> they sow<S>4687</S> not<S>3756</S>, neither<S>3761</S> do they reap<S>2325</S>, nor<S>3761</S> gather<S>4863</S> into<S>1519</S> barns<S>596</S>; yet<S>2532</S> your<S>5216</S> heavenly<S>3770</S> Father<S>3962</S> feedeth<S>5142</S> them<S>846</S>. Are<S>1308</S> ye<S>5210</S> not<S>3756</S> much<S>3123</S> better than<S>1308</S> they<S>846</S>?
<S>1161</S> Which<S>1537</S> <S>5101</S> of you<S>5216</S> by taking thought<S>3309</S> can<S>1410</S> add<S>4369</S> one<S>1520</S> cubit<S>4083</S> unto<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> stature<S>2244</S>?
And<S>2532</S> why<S>5101</S> take ye thought<S>3309</S> for<S>4012</S> raiment<S>1742</S>? Consider<S>2648</S> the lilies<S>2918</S> of the field<S>68</S>, how<S>4459</S> they grow<S>837</S>; they toil<S>2872</S> not<S>3756</S>, neither<S>3761</S> do they spin<S>3514</S>:
And yet<S>1161</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> even<S>3761</S> Solomon<S>4672</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> glory<S>1391</S> was<S>4016</S> not<S>3761</S> arrayed<S>4016</S> like<S>5613</S> one<S>1520</S> of these<S>5130</S>.
Wherefore<S>1161</S>, if<S>1487</S> God<S>2316</S> so<S>3779</S> clothe<S>294</S> the grass<S>5528</S> of the field<S>68</S>, which to day<S>4594</S> is<S>5607</S>, and<S>2532</S> to morrow<S>839</S> is cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the oven<S>2823</S>, shall he not<S>3756</S> much<S>4183</S> more<S>3123</S> clothe you<S>5209</S>, O ye of little faith<S>3640</S>?
Therefore<S>3767</S> take no<S>3361</S> thought<S>3309</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, What<S>5101</S> shall we eat<S>5315</S>? or<S>2228</S>, What<S>5101</S> shall we drink<S>4095</S>? or<S>2228</S>, Wherewithal<S>5101</S> shall we be clothed<S>4016</S>?
(For<S>1063</S> after<S>1934</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> do the Gentiles<S>1484</S> seek<S>1934</S>:) for<S>1063</S> your<S>5216</S> heavenly<S>3770</S> Father<S>3962</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> ye have need<S>5535</S> of all<S>537</S> these things<S>5130</S>.
But<S>1161</S> seek ye<S>2212</S> first<S>4412</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> righteousness<S>1343</S>; and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S> shall be added<S>4369</S> unto you<S>5213</S>.
Take<S>3309</S> therefore<S>3767</S> no<S>3361</S> thought<S>3309</S> for<S>1519</S> the morrow<S>839</S>: for<S>1063</S> the morrow<S>839</S> shall take thought<S>3309</S> for the things<S>3588</S> of itself<S>1438</S>. Sufficient<S>713</S> unto the day<S>2250</S> is the evil<S>2549</S> thereof<S>846</S>.
